# noComment

<!-- badges: start -->
![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/adam-gruer/noComment/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of noComment is to let you select commented lines in your source editor and run them in the console.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nocomment from [github](https://github.com) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("adam-gruer/noComment")

```
